Title: Notices, fines, court case & now a limited ban - RBI-Kotak relationship has been fraught for years

Title: Why Has RBI Barred Kotak Mahindra Bank from Adding New Customers Online? What’s Next for the Lender?

Title: RBI bars Kotak Mahindra Bank from issuing new credit cards, adding new customers online or via mobile
